title: Kiss Me, I'm Undead
description: Kayla Smith wakes up with no recollection of what happened to her while walking home from her last shift as a cocktail waitress at the local club. She has a new neighbor who's hot (but weird) and dead guys are popping up all over town, killed in an all-too-familiar way.Her boss is shot protecting her one night at the bar, and Kayla vows to solve the mystery behind the sudden uptick in violence, but one thing keeps getting in the way.Kayla is very...very...hungry..._________________________________________________________________________________________________________________"A deliciously smart-mouthed page-turner, Driver's razor-sharp wit and unapologetic sarcasm perfectly deliver that round-house kick to the teeth I've come to love from sassy paranormal heroines.She is definitely an author to watch."-- J.D. Brown, Award-Winning Author of the Ema Marx series
author: Tasha L. Driver
